display_help: Logging out in the Rift Enclosure will earn you charges for a Self Teleportation power. The longer you log out, the more charges you will earn, up to a total of 30 charges. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Portal Analyst Day Job badge, that will increase the rate that charges are earned.
display_target_help: Logging out in the Rift Enclosure will earn you charges for a Self Teleportation power. The longer you log out, the more charges you will earn, up to a total of 30 charges. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Portal Analyst Day Job badge, that will increase the rate that charges are earned.
